articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Golden Knights tame Panthers to capture 1st Stanley Cup in just 6th year of existence | CBC Sports
articles.description: The Vegas Golden Knights captured the franchise's first Stanley Cup in just its sixth season of existence on Tuesday after closing out the Florida Panthers at home with a 6-1 win in Game 5 of the finals.
